name: ANIMALES - ANIMALS
description: Learn the names of animals in Spanish in the simplest way combining spectacular images with audio in Spanish - British English  Diction of the two languages help you to memorize the name of the animal easily. The enlargement of the image while listening to the name reinforce your learning. It also displays the name written in both languages, with English phonetics. In the application are displayed about 100 name of animals, the most common ones (Savannah animals, jungle, farm, puppies, insects, birds, etc.)   The application is for students, although it is funny for children. Its use is advisable from two years old.   Awarded by the MIT APP INVENTOR as the most innovative application of the month! http://appinventor.mit.edu/explore/app-month-gallery.html  Thanks.
